name: Chromadice Rush
description:
Get to the end of each level as fast as possible, but there's a catch: you play as a die, and the only way to move is by pressing the corresponding dice side! Race against the clock in order to complete the game's series of challenges. 

Play through a gauntlet of levels and try your best to complete them all within the time limit!

---

Controls:

1,2,3,4,5,6 (number line or numpad) to push the dice in the appropriate way. Forward, strafing, and jumping are all relative based on what sides are present and the direction they are facing

A/left arrow: rotate the camera clockwise around the dice

D/right arrow: rotate the camera counter-clockwise around the dice
